message: Let's be fair and reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your split sounds fair, but I'm aiming a bit higher. How about we go 52.5% - 47.5%?
I see you're aiming higher, but I'm not going that low. How about we meet in the middle of our previous offers?
Time is ticking, Alice! I'm willing to meet in the middle of our previous offers to get this done.
